Name: Hammer 2
About the game: Hammer 2 Reloaded is an action game in the third person where you will incarnate Hammer a hero of modern times! Take your rifle and kill anyone who gets in your way! Take up arms and kill anyone who gets in your way! Use the land and vehicles to your advantage during your missions! To make a perfect score, you will have to: get the highest score, complete the mission in a specific time, and find the secret package! Can you kill all the enemies and finish the game 100%? Features : ■ A unique design! ■ More than 30 crazy missions! ■ 10 successes to unlock in game! ■ Many vehicles to build! ■ A completely destructible map! ■ Various weapons for even more carnage! ■ A multitude of enemies to fight! ■ Ambient music to immerse you in the action! ■ An addictive gameplay!
